FuncDef: When the ignore-router-id command is present and the current best path to a destination was learned from EBGP peer X with BGP identifier x and a new path is received from EBGP peer Y with BGP identifier y the best path remains unchanged if the new path is equivalent to the current best path up to the BGP identifier comparison - even if y is less than x. The no form of the command restores the default behavior of selecting the route with the lowest BGP identifier (y) as best.
